meanings.definition: To remove the contents of (a container)
meanings.sent1: She empties the trash every evening.
meanings.sent2: He empties his backpack after school.
meanings.sent3: The magician empties the hat, but no rabbit appears.
meanings.sent4: His laughter empties the room of tension.
meanings.sent5: The river empties into the vast ocean.

meanings.sent1: The recycling bin is full of empties.
meanings.sent2: She collected all the empties for recycling.
meanings.sent3: The party was over, and all that remained were the empties.
meanings.sent4: The field was scattered with empties after the festival.
meanings.sent5: The shelf held a row of empties waiting to be filled again.
